short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A coaching tool that analyzes your mouse activity during demos, helping you deliver kick-ass demo flows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DemoBuddy is the free coaching tool helping you deliver kick-ass demo flows. It analyses things such as mouse movement, speed, acceleration, clicks, page visits and does calculation breakdowns on metrics per minute🥇

The DemoBuddy extension analyzes your demo flows. The benefit is that you can understand how you conduct demos and unlock immediate value what you need to improve in order to make your demos outstanding. Thanks to DemoBuddy, you can avoid losing important deals since your audience will experience smooth & educational top-tier demos. 

You'll also receive advice on how to focus on value and pain in your demos, instead of falling into the feature-trap. Say arrivederci to unnecessary mouse movements, fast clicks and annoying tics🖱🔥

DemoBuddy helps you with: 
✅ Time management
✅ Becoming more educational in your demos
✅ Avoiding subconscious mouse or click tics
✅ Focusing on value over features
✅ Being a professional demo guru who delivers smooth and on-point demos, closing more deals

This makes DemoBuddy perfect for: Sales reps (AM's, AE's etc.), Customer Success (CS, KAM etc.), Sales leaders, Founders and CEOs.


Do you know how many ‘clicks per minute’ you log in the average demo? Well, you should 😏

“We bought the product because the demo was full of clicks on lots of features!”
- Said No One Ever

Try DemoBuddy today for free and share your score!
by Hot SaaS🌶🚀
